thread.title: PSN Status DOWN - PlayStation Network not working as Server suffers another outage
thread.title_full: PSN Status DOWN - PlayStation Network not working as Server suffers another outage

title: PSN Status DOWN - PlayStation Network not working as Server suffers another outage
text:
SONY PSN DOWN: The PlayStation Network is currently offline and not working 
The PlayStation Network is down once again and suffering a major network outage â€“ its third in as many days. 
PS4 players have been left unable to sign-in or use network features, including online multiplayer due to a server issue. 
Website monitoring service, Down Detector, is also showing major issues across the PSN network. 
And PlayStation fans have taken to Twitter to moan about the issues with many confirming PSN is down. 
It's currently unclear what has caused tonight's outage for the time being. 
The PlayStation Network Service Status is showing as green for all services, but fans are complaining of being unable to access online services. 
However, multiple PSN users are reporting of being booted from their games, with many unable to engage in party chat at all on PSN. 
One Twitter user tweeted @AskPlayStation to say: "hey what's up with psn I can access everything but my friends list" 
Another tweeted: "Well I'd like to be streaming right now....if PSN wasn't down for me. This is really starting to get irritating." 
For the time being, there's still no official word from PlayStation and the server status page is still showing as all services as working fine. 
The Ask PlayStation Twitter support team have not responded to the flood of questions asking about the state of PSN. 
However, we imagine they'll tell you, like they have on other occaisions, to send over any "error codes or messages when you try to connect to the network?" PS4 System software 4.50 Update - Screenshots Friday, 3rd February 2017 Get a run-down of the biggest features in the forthcoming update. 1 / 5 Sony Custom Wallpapers 
It comes just days after PSN was hit by a similar outage over the weekend, as fans were greeted with maintenance error messages. 
That was despite the fact that there was no scheduled maintenance confirmed for that day. 
Fans reported (WS-37432-9) error codes, although the problem was fixed in a relatively short period of time. 
Perhaps it's connected to the new PS4 update, which is currently being tested by beta members. *** We will continue to update this story until the PSN servers are back online for the majority of people *** Related articles
